servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

entry.ptxt: Radiator cooling fan relay No.3 drive circuit malfunction is detected.
(2 D/C detecting logic but MIL does not light up)

item.ptxt: Radiator cooling fan relay No.3 (coil side) and/or its circuit

s1.ptxt: Run engine at idle for 1 min.

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:N32A .

testgroup.title: Radiator cooling fan relay No.3 power supply circuit (coil side) check

test1.ptxt: With ignition switch turned OFF, remove radiator cooling fan relay No.3.
Check for proper terminal connection to radiator cooling fan relay No.3 connector.
If connections are OK, check that radiator cooling fan relay No.3 power supply circuit (coil side) (B1) is battery voltage with ignition switch turned ON.

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

action.ptxt: Repair or replace defective wire harness.

testgroup.title: Radiator cooling fan relay No.3 check

test1.ptxt: Check radiator cooling fan relay No.3.

testgroup.question: Is it in good condition?

action.ptxt: Repair or replace radiator cooling fan relay No.3.

testgroup.title: Radiator cooling fan relay No.3 drive circuit check

test1.ptxt: With ignition switch turned OFF, disconnect connectors from ECM.
Check for proper connection to ECM connectors.
If connections are OK, check that radiator cooling fan relay No.3 drive circuit (B3) is as follows.

item.ptxt: Wiring harness resistance of radiator cooling fan relay No.3 drive circuit is less than 3 Ω.
Insulation resistance between radiator cooling fan relay No.3 drive circuit and vehicle body ground is infinity.
Insulation resistance of wire harness is infinity between radiator cooling fan relay No.3 drive circuit terminal and other terminal at radiator cooling fan relay No.3 connector.
Circuit voltage of radiator cooling fan relay No.3 drive circuit is 0 – 1 V with ignition switch turned ON.

testgroup.question: Are they in good condition?

action.ptxt: Repair or replace defective wire harness.

testgroup.title: Troubleshooting of other DTC(s) at the same time
testgroup.question: Is other DTC(s) detected together?

action.ptxt: Go to troubleshooting for applicable DTC.
Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
